name: Huize Aarde
memberOrga: Doesn't work with memberships, but collaborates with other private initiatives in the EU like WECF (Women Engaged in a Common Future).
goal: SHA is a non-profit consultancy from the Netherlands, founded in 1992. It aims to benefit present and future generations, following policies and action points of the United Nations agenda for a sustainable society in the 21st C. Various chapters of this “Agenda 21” are integrated for the development of Green Health Care and other concepts and programs. SHA’s vision: in addition to socially responsible products and services, the transformation to a sustainable society requires cross-disciplinary knowledge building, cross-sectorsal policy development, and above all, an integrated approach to the solution of current social issues.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Policy development on the environmental cycle of human and veterinary medicines and multi-resistant bacteria.
